maximize_objective.description: If True, the objective function is maximized.

normalize_constraints.description: If True, the outputs of the coupling consistency constraints are scaled.

parallel_exec.description: If True, all constraints and objectives are computed in parallel. At every iteration, all disciplines are executed in parallel. Otherwise, a separate constraint is created for each discipline with couplings.

use_threading.description: If True and parallel_exec=True, the disciplines are run in parallel using multi-threading. If False and parallel_exec=True, multi-processing is used.

start_at_equilibrium.description: If True, an MDA is used to initialize the coupling variables.

grammar_type.description: The type of the input and output grammars, either :attr:`.MDODiscipline.JSON_GRAMMAR_TYPE` or :attr:`.MDODiscipline.SIMPLE_GRAMMAR_TYPE`.
